pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extract, Visualize and Analyze Cricket Statistics from ESPNCricinfo's Statsguru // Use this package to scrap Test Matches, One Day Internationals, Twenty-20 Internationals data of a player from ESPNCricinfo's Statsguru (http://stats.espncricinfo.com/ci/engine/stats/index.html) and then visualize their batting, bowling and fielding performances in the form of charts and graphs.
